query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE subject_id = ?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject

query.name: findAnotherByIdentifier
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE unique_identifier = ? and subject_id !=?

query.name: findAllByLimit
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject limit 5

query.name: findAllChildrenByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject where mother_id=? or father_id=?

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifier
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE unique_identifier=?

query.name: getCountWithFilter
query.sql: select count (DISTINCT s.subject_id) from subject s,study_subject ss,study where s.subject_id = ss.subject_id and study.study_id = ss.study_id

query.name: getWithFilterAndSort
query.sql: select DISTINCT s.* from subject s,study_subject ss,study where s.subject_id = ss.subject_id and study.study_id = ss.study_id

query.name: findAllSubjectsAndStudies
query.sql: SELECT s.*, ss.label, stu.unique_identifier AS study_unique_identifier FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study stu WHERE s.subject_id = ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id = stu.study_id ORDER BY s.subject_id, stu.study_id

query.name: countProtocolDeviationByStudy
query.sql: SELECT COUNT( mss.study_subject_id) FROM study_subject mss, study mst WHERE mss.study_id = mst.study_id AND (mst.study_id=? or mst.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllProtocolDeviationSeverity
query.sql: SELECT * FROM protocol_deviation_severity ORDER BY protocol_deviation_severity_id;

query.name: findProtocolDeviationSubjectById
query.sql: SELECT pds.id, pds.protocol_deviation_id, pds.subject_id, ss.label, ss.secondary_label FROM protocol_deviation_subject pds INNER JOIN study_subject ss ON pds.subject_id = ss.study_subject_id WHERE pds.protocol_deviation_id = ? AND pds.subject_id = ?

query.name: findProtocolDeviationByIdAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT pd.protocol_deviation_id, pd."label", pd.study_id, pd.item_a_1, pd.item_a_2, COALESCE(pd.item_a_3, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_3, COALESCE(pd.item_a_4, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_4, COALESCE(pd.item_a_5, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_5, pd.item_a_6, pd.item_a_7, /* 1 - 9*/ COALESCE(pd.item_a_7_1, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_7_1, pd.item_a_8, pd.item_b_1, pd.item_b_2, pd.item_b_3, pd.item_b_4, pd.item_b_5, pd.item_b_6, pd.item_b_7, pd.item_b_8, /* 10 - 19 */ pd.item_b_9, pd.item_b_10, pd.item_b_11, pd.item_b_12, pd.item_b_13, pd.item_b_14, pd.item_b_15, pd.item_b_16, pd.item_b_17, pd.item_b_18, /* 20 - 29 */ pd.item_c_1_1, pd.item_c_1_2, pd.item_c_1_3, pd.item_c_1_4, pd.item_c_1_5, pd.item_c_1_6, pd.item_c_1_7, pd.item_c_1_8, pd.item_c_1_9, pd.item_c_1_10, /* 30 - 39 */ pd.item_c_2, COALESCE(pd.item_d_1_a, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_d_1_a, pd.item_d_1_b, pd.item_e1, pd.item_e2, pd.item_e3, pd.item_e4, pd.item_f_1, pd.item_f_2, COALESCE(pd.item_f_3, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_f_3, /* 40 - 49*/ pd.item_g_1, pd.item_g_2_1, pd.item_g_2_2, pd.item_g_2_3, pd.item_g_2_4, pd.item_g_3, pd.item_g_4, pd.item_g_5, COALESCE(pd.item_g_6, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_g_6, pd.item_g_6_1_a, /* 50 - 59 */ pd.item_g_6_1_b, pd.item_g_6_1_c, pd.item_g_6_2_a, pd.item_g_6_2_b, pd.item_g_6_2_c, pd.item_g_6_3_a, pd.item_g_6_3_b, pd.item_g_6_3_c, /* 60 - 67 */ pd.item_g_6_4_a, pd.item_g_6_4_b, pd.item_g_6_4_c, pd.item_g_7, pd.item_g_8, pd.item_g_9 FROM protocol_deviation pd WHERE pd.protocol_deviation_id = ? AND pd.study_id = ? AND pd.study_id = ?

query.name: findAllProtocolDeviationsByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT pd.protocol_deviation_id, pd."label", pd.study_id, pd.item_a_1, pd.item_a_2, COALESCE(pd.item_a_3, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_3, COALESCE(pd.item_a_4, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_4, COALESCE(pd.item_a_5, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_5, pd.item_a_6, pd.item_a_7, /* 1 - 9*/ COALESCE(pd.item_a_7_1, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_a_7_1, pd.item_a_8, pd.item_b_1, pd.item_b_2, pd.item_b_3, pd.item_b_4, pd.item_b_5, pd.item_b_6, pd.item_b_7, pd.item_b_8, /* 10 - 19 */ pd.item_b_9, pd.item_b_10, pd.item_b_11, pd.item_b_12, pd.item_b_13, pd.item_b_14, pd.item_b_15, pd.item_b_16, pd.item_b_17, pd.item_b_18, /* 20 - 29 */ pd.item_c_1_1, pd.item_c_1_2, pd.item_c_1_3, pd.item_c_1_4, pd.item_c_1_5, pd.item_c_1_6, pd.item_c_1_7, pd.item_c_1_8, pd.item_c_1_9, pd.item_c_1_10, /* 30 - 39 */ pd.item_c_2, COALESCE(pd.item_d_1_a, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_d_1_a, pd.item_d_1_b, pd.item_e1, pd.item_e2, pd.item_e3, pd.item_e4, pd.item_f_1, pd.item_f_2, COALESCE(pd.item_f_3, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_f_3, /* 40 - 49*/ pd.item_g_1, pd.item_g_2_1, pd.item_g_2_2, pd.item_g_2_3, pd.item_g_2_4, pd.item_g_3, pd.item_g_4, pd.item_g_5, COALESCE(pd.item_g_6, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) item_g_6, pd.item_g_6_1_a, /* 50 - 59 */ pd.item_g_6_1_b, pd.item_g_6_1_c, pd.item_g_6_2_a, pd.item_g_6_2_b, pd.item_g_6_2_c, pd.item_g_6_3_a, pd.item_g_6_3_b, pd.item_g_6_3_c, /* 60 - 67 */ pd.item_g_6_4_a, pd.item_g_6_4_b, pd.item_g_6_4_c, pd.item_g_7, pd.item_g_8, pd.item_g_9 FROM protocol_deviation pd WHERE study_id = ?

query.name: findSubjectsByProtocolDeviationId
query.sql: SELECT protocol_deviation_id, "label", study_id, item_a_1, item_a_2, COALESCE(item_a_3, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)), COALESCE(item_a_4, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)), COALESCE(item_a_5, CAST('1900-1-1') AS DATE), item_a_6, item_a_7, /* 1 - 9*/ COALESCE(item_a_7_1, CAST('1900-1-1') AS DATE), item_a_8, item_b_1, item_b_2, item_b_3, item_b_4, item_b_5, item_b_6, item_b_7, item_b_8, /* 10 - 19 */ item_b_9, item_b_10, item_b_11, item_b_12, item_b_13, item_b_14, item_b_15, item_b_16, item_b_17, item_b_18, /* 20 - 29 */ item_c_1_1, item_c_1_2, item_c_1_3, item_c_1_4, item_c_1_5, item_c_1_6, item_c_1_7, item_c_1_8, item_c_1_9, item_c_1_10, /* 30 - 39 */ item_c_2, COALESCE(item_d_1_a, CAST('1900-1-1') AS DATE), item_d_1_b, item_e1, item_e2, item_e3, item_e4, item_f_1, item_f_2, COALESCE(item_f_3, CAST('1990-1-1' AS DATE)), /* 40 - 49*/ item_g_1, item_g_2_1, item_g_2_2, item_g_2_3, item_g_2_4, item_g_3, item_g_4, item_g_5, COALESCE(item_g_6 AS CAST('1900-1-1') AS DATE), item_g_6_1_a, /* 50 - 59 */ item_g_6_1_b, item_g_6_1_c, item_g_6_2_a, item_g_6_2_b, item_g_6_2_c, item_g_6_3_a, item_g_6_3_b, item_g_6_3_c, /* 60 - 67 */ item_g_6_4_a, item_g_6_4_b, item_g_6_4_c, item_g_7, item_g_8, item_g_9 FROM protocol_deviation_subject pds INNER JOIN study_subject ss ON pds.subject_id = ss.study_subject_id WHERE protocol_deviation_id = ?

query.name: createProtocolDeviationSubject
query.sql: INSERT INTO protocol_deviation_subject(protocol_deviation_id, subject_id) VALUES(?, ?);

query.name: getCurrentProtocolDeviationPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT currval('protocol_deviation_protocol_deviation_id_seq') AS key

query.name: getCurrentProtocolDeviationSubjectPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT currval('protocol_deviation_subject_id_seq') AS key

query.name: createProtocolDeviation
query.sql: INSERT INTO public.protocol_deviation ( "label", study_id, item_a_1, item_a_2, item_a_3, item_a_4, item_a_5, item_a_6, item_a_7, /* 1 - 9*/ item_a_7_1, item_a_8, item_b_1, item_b_2, item_b_3, item_b_4, item_b_5, item_b_6, item_b_7, item_b_8, /* 10 - 19 */ item_b_9, item_b_10, item_b_11, item_b_12, item_b_13, item_b_14, item_b_15, item_b_16, item_b_17, item_b_18, /* 20 - 29 */ item_c_1_1, item_c_1_2, item_c_1_3, item_c_1_4, item_c_1_5, item_c_1_6, item_c_1_7, item_c_1_8, item_c_1_9, item_c_1_10, /* 30 - 39 */ item_c_2, item_d_1_a, item_d_1_b, item_e1, item_e2, item_e3, item_e4, item_f_1, item_f_2, item_f_3, /* 40 - 49*/ item_g_1, item_g_2_1, item_g_2_2, item_g_2_3, item_g_2_4, item_g_3, item_g_4, item_g_5, item_g_6, item_g_6_1_a, /* 50 - 59 */ item_g_6_1_b, item_g_6_1_c, item_g_6_2_a, item_g_6_2_b, item_g_6_2_c, item_g_6_3_a, item_g_6_3_b, item_g_6_3_c, /* 60 - 67 */ item_g_6_4_a, item_g_6_4_b, item_g_6_4_c, item_g_7, item_g_8, item_g_9 /* 68 - 73 */ ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? );

query.name: updateProtocolDeviation
query.sql: UPDATE protocol_deviation SET label = ?, study_id = ?, item_a_1 = ?, item_a_2 = ?, item_a_3 = ?, item_a_4 = ?, item_a_5 = ?, item_a_6 = ?, item_a_7 = ?, item_a_7_1 = ?, item_a_8 = ?, item_b_1 = ?, item_b_2 = ?, item_b_3 = ?, item_b_4 = ?, item_b_5 = ?, item_b_6 = ?, item_b_7 = ?, item_b_8 = ?, item_b_9 = ?, item_b_10 = ?, item_b_11 = ?, item_b_12 = ?, item_b_13 = ?, item_b_14 = ?, item_b_15 = ?, item_b_16 = ?, item_b_17 = ?, item_b_18 = ?, item_c_1_1 = ?, item_c_1_2 = ?, item_c_1_3 = ?, item_c_1_4 = ?, item_c_1_5 = ?, item_c_1_6 = ?, item_c_1_7 = ?, item_c_1_8 = ?, item_c_1_9 = ?, item_c_1_10 = ?, item_c_2 = ?, item_d_1_a = ?, item_d_1_b = ?, item_e1 = ?, item_e2 = ?, item_e3 = ?, item_e4 = ?, item_f_1 = ?, item_f_2 = ?, item_f_3 = ?, item_g_1 = ?, item_g_2_1 = ?, item_g_2_2 = ?, item_g_2_3 = ?, item_g_2_4 = ?, item_g_3 = ?, item_g_4 = ?, item_g_5 = ?, item_g_6 = ?, item_g_6_1_a = ?, item_g_6_1_b = ?, item_g_6_1_c = ?, item_g_6_2_a = ?, item_g_6_2_b = ?, item_g_6_2_c = ?, item_g_6_3_a = ?, item_g_6_3_b = ?, item_g_6_3_c = ?, item_g_6_4_a = ?, item_g_6_4_b = ?, item_g_6_4_c = ?, item_g_7 = ?, item_g_8 = ?, item_g_9 = ? WHERE protocol_deviation_id = ?

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifierAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT s.* FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study st WHERE s.subject_id=ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id= st.study_id AND s.unique_identifier=? AND st.study_id=?

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifierAndAnyStudy
query.sql: SELECT s.* FROM study_subject ss JOIN subject s on s.subject_id=ss.subject_id JOIN study st on st.study_id= ss.study_id WHERE s.unique_identifier=? AND (st.parent_study_id=? OR st.study_id=?)

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifierAndParentStudy
query.sql: SELECT s.* FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study st WHERE s.subject_id=ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id= st.study_id AND s.unique_identifier=? AND st.parent_study_id=?

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO subject ( STATUS_ID, DATE_OF_BIRTH,GENDER,UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER,DATE_CREATED, OWNER_ID,DOB_COLLECTED) VALUES (?,?,?,?,now(),?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE subject SET STATUS_ID=?, DATE_OF_BIRTH=?,GENDER=?,UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER=?, DATE_UPDATED=now(), UPDATE_ID=?,DOB_COLLECTED=? WHERE SUBJECT_ID=?

query.name: getCurrentPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT currval('subject_subject_id_seq') AS key

query.name: findAllMales
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='m'

query.name: findAllFemales
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='f'

query.name: findAllFemalesNotSelf
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='f' and subject_id !=?

query.name: findAllMalesNotSelf
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='m' and subject_id !=?

query.name: deleteTestSubject
query.sql: delete from subject where unique_identifier=?
